channel.title: Using Templates :: Java Web Development
channel.description: In the next video , you will extend your hello-spring project and practice using Thymeleaf templates as you code along with the clip. Before you get there, however, we need to review a few core skills and best-practices. Passing Data to a Template The controller class contains methods that send data to different templates. These methods have a structure similar to: public String methodName(Model model) { // method code here model.
